announcements.title: What's New in Penpoint 1.0.4
announcements.message: Major feature release: Smart Quotes, Insert Chapter, Export/Import Wizard, and critical bug fixes!

announcements.title: Welcome to the Penpoint Beta!
announcements.message: Thank you for being part of our beta program! Your feedback is invaluable as we build the best writing tool for tracking characters across your stories. We're excited to have you here!
